S

scene - Variable in class Project.SceneMediator
 
SceneMediator - Class in Project
Concrete implementation of a Mediator that handle and redirect requests from a set of objects that should exchange information among each other This is done in order to reduce the number of connections required in the application.
SceneMediator(Scene) - Constructor for class Project.SceneMediator
 
setCurrentGeneration(Individual[]) - Method in class GeneticAlgorithm.GeneticAlgorithm
When necessary the current population may be forced to fit any provided For this concrete program it is required because the Individuals generated and evolved lack of fitness value, which can only be calculated after a simulation is performed so the fitness value for each individual is calculated outside this class and then here the results are received
setFitnessValue(double) - Method in class GeneticAlgorithm.Individual

setSimulationTime(long) - Method in class Project.SimulationController
User-chosen time limit that all the bouncers have for reach the target zone
setUserParameters(int, int, Color, int) - Method in class Project.Model
Sets various user-given parameters that may affect visually the performance of the simulations.
simulationController - Variable in class Project.Model
